basalt.server

Class WebSocketListener

  • basalt.server.WebSocketListener

  • public class WebSocketListener

    The listener class which responds to WebSocket Events, including (but not limited to) incoming messages.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      BasaltServer server
      A

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WebSocketListener(BasaltServer server)
      Constructs a WebSocketListener from a class BasaltServer instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClose(io.undertow.websockets.core.WebSocketChannel webSocketChannel, io.undertow.websockets.core.StreamSourceFrameChannel channel)
      Fired by Undertow when the WebSocket Connection between Basalt and a client closes.
      void onError(io.undertow.websockets.core.WebSocketChannel channel, java.lang.Throwable error)
      Fired by Undertow upon an error that was thrown during WebSocket Communication.
      void onFullTextMessage(io.undertow.websockets.core.WebSocketChannel channel, io.undertow.websockets.core.BufferedTextMessage message)
      Fired by Undertow upon a full text message (such as JSON Data) being sent by a client.

      • onClose

        public void onClose(io.undertow.websockets.core.WebSocketChannel webSocketChannel,
                    io.undertow.websockets.core.StreamSourceFrameChannel channel)

        Fired by Undertow when the WebSocket Connection between Basalt and a client closes.

        Parameters:
        webSocketChannel - The WebSocketChannel that was closed.
        channel - The StreamSourceFrameChannel that was closed.

      • onError

        public void onError(io.undertow.websockets.core.WebSocketChannel channel,
                    java.lang.Throwable error)

        Fired by Undertow upon an error that was thrown during WebSocket Communication.

        Parameters:
        channel - The WebSocketChannel that errored.
        error - The Throwable instance that was thrown.

      • onFullTextMessage

        public void onFullTextMessage(io.undertow.websockets.core.WebSocketChannel channel,
                              io.undertow.websockets.core.BufferedTextMessage message)

        Fired by Undertow upon a full text message (such as JSON Data) being sent by a client.

        Parameters:
        channel - The WebSocketChannel that data was sent to.
        message - The BufferedTextMessage data that was sent.
